message.body: Dear Farnaz, I hope all is well. Would be nice to see you. Let me know how your schedule is like.
I will wait for you to get in touch about meeting before the semester begins. I have one paper due 8/6 and one 8/30. So after 8/6 would be good.
That should work. Ramadan ends the 10th. I hope you get approval for Jake's Independent Study. I would attend too!
